TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BevelBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class BevelBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
创建凹凸效果，根据指定的曲线提升图像表面。

span.span: Creates a bevel which raises the surface of the image according to a specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果是呈现的软件。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不应将位图效果应用到大型视觉对象或动画，因为这可能会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations as this can degrade performance. 凹凸效果 （凹凸效果曲线） 的类型由属性。The type of bevel (bevel curve) is determined by the property. 是随 SDK 提供的多种效果之一。 is one of several effects that are shipped with the SDK. 其他影响包括：Other effects include: - - - - 如下图所示应用于视觉对象 (在这种情况下应用于)。The following illustration shows a applied to a visual object (in this case applied to a ). ![屏幕快照： 比较普通和具有凹凸效果按钮](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "屏幕快照： 比较普通和具有凹凸效果按钮")![Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons](~/add/media/effects-bevelsimple1.png "Screenshot: Compare normal and bevelled buttons") 下图显示了几个基本属性的影响。The following illustrations show the effect of several basic properties of . 属性指定如何宽凹凸效果是：The property specifies how wide the bevel is: ![屏幕快照： 比较 BevelWidth 值](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "屏幕快照： 比较 BevelWidth 值")![Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values](~/add/media/effects-bevelbevelwidth.png "Screenshot: Compare BevelWidth values") 属性指定凹凸效果的曲线：The property specifies the curve of the bevel: ![屏幕快照： 比较 EdgeProfile 的值](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "屏幕快照： 比较 EdgeProfile 的值")![Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile](~/add/media/effects-beveledgeprofile.png "Screenshot: Compare values of EdgeProfile") 属性指定凹凸效果的起伏：The property specifies the relief of the bevel: ![屏幕快照： 比较 relief 属性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "屏幕快照： 比较 relief 属性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") 属性指定平滑凹凸效果阴影是：The property specifies how smooth the shadows of the bevel are: ![屏幕快照： 比较 Smoothness 属性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Smoothness 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") 属性指定从哪个方向"虚拟光"来自凹凸效果阴影：The property specifies from which direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel: ![屏幕快照： 比较光的角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "屏幕快照： 比较光入射角")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles")

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double LightAngle { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.LightAngle : double with get, set

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
获取或设置创造棱台阴影的“虚拟光”所来自的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction the "virtual light" is coming from that creates the shadows of the bevel.
The direction of the virtual light source.

value.span: 有效范围是 0-360（度），0 表示对象的右侧，连续值围绕对象逆时针移动。

span.span: The valid range is from 0-360 (degrees) with 0 specifying the right-hand side of the object and successive values moving counter-clockwise around the object.

value.span: 棱台的阴影位于入射光的对侧。

span.span: The shadows of the bevel are on the opposite side of where the light is cast.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图显示了此属性的给定值来自的光线方向。The following diagram shows what direction light comes from for a given value of this property. 凹凸效果阴影投射光线角度在相反一侧。Shadows of the bevel are cast on the opposite side from the light angle. ![示意图： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "示意图： DropShadow 方向")![Diagram: DropShadow direction](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "Diagram: DropShadow direction") 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照： 比较光的角度](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "屏幕快照： 比较光入射角")![Screenshot: Compare light angles](~/add/media/effects-bevellightangle.png "Screenshot: Compare light angles") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
获取或设置凹凸效果的起伏高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the relief of the bevel.
The height of the relief of the bevel.

value.span: 有效范围应介于0并1与1起伏高度最 （最暗的阴影）。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 having the most relief (darkest shadows).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照： 比较 relief 属性](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "屏幕快照： 比较 relief 属性")![Screenshot: Compare relief properties](~/add/media/effects-bevelrelief.png "Screenshot: Compare relief properties") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
获取或设置凹凸效果阴影的平滑程度。

span.span: Gets or sets how smooth the shadows of the bevel are.

value.span: 表示凹凸效果阴影的平滑程度的值。

span.span: Value indicating how smooth the bevel shadows are.

value.span: 有效范围应介于0并1与1表示最平滑。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 and 1 with 1 being the smoothest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照： 比较 Smoothness 属性值](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Smoothness 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values](~/add/media/effects-bevelsmoothness.png "Screenshot: Compare Smoothness property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
